channel.title: Can someone tell me how to change cords?
channel.description: hello i am looking for a way to get rid of tutorial island and make it so the spawn points in entrana can some one please tell me how to and walk me thru it step by step btw i am a new coder using battlescape isle source.

item.title: Can someone tell me how to change cords?
item.dc:creator: @laxmaster213 laxmaster213
item.description:
@laxmaster213 wrote:

ok what you have to do is go into player.java scroll down a bit and find the starting corrds like this

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3207; // 3207; teleportToY = 3434; // 3434;
you might not have an this as a whole but you get the point about the teleporttox and teleporttoy

I hope this helps you!

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me how to change cords?
